title: Apple’s M2 chip nears as Samsung beats LG as processor packaging partner
content:
Samsung Electro-Mechanics is collaborating with Apple on creating the M2 chip, beating out LG Innotek. Samsung is developing the flip chip ball grid array (FC-BGA) for the new generation of Apple Silicon for 2022.

more…

The post Apple’s M2 chip nears as Samsung beats LG as processor packaging partner appeared first on 9to5Mac.
description: Samsung Electro-Mechanics is collaborating with Apple on creating the M2 chip this year, beating out LG Innotek.
